name: Tower on a floating rock
description:
Made for GMTK Jam 2018. My first ever jam game, please be gentle.

A bullet hell in which the player can't dodge at all.

12 waves, 1 boss. Hope you can beat them all without moving an inch.

Controls: 

Left click to shoot, hold down to shoot faster.

Right click to block, too many bullets can break past the block.

Shoot green bullets or let the run into you to heal, blocking them does nothing.

Credits: 

Bullet hell pattern generator (asset) by Michael Wringer

Royalty free music by Purple-planet.com

Menu buttons by Lethal Kitten

Everything else by me :D
